name: Bovinari
description: A beast of primal rage. Its horns are said to pierce through the toughest armor.

name: Rondine
description: A swift assassin who strikes like the wind. By the time you hear her, it's too late.

name: Ferzen
description: The Ice Lord whose frozen domain knows no mercy. His cold heart matches his frozen powers.

name: Black Shadow
description: The embodiment of darkness itself. It exists in the space between light and void.

name: Volgagon
description: The volcanic dragon. Lava flows through its veins and its breath incinerates everything.
